Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Fiendish \Fiend"ish\, a. Like a fiend; diabolically wicked or cruel; infernal; malignant; devilish; hellish. -- {Fiend"ish*ly}, adv. -- {Fiend"ish*ness}, n. [1913 Webster]
fiendishly adv : as a devil; in an evil manner; "his writing could be diabolically satiric" [syn: {diabolically}, {devilishly}]
